text: she's been accused of trying to poison
Zimbabwe vice president of beating a
young woman with electric cord and she's
earned the nickname Gucci grace for her
extravagant shopping trips Grace Mugabe
Zimbabwe's First Lady has earned quite a
reputation for herself over the years
she's also managed to catapult herself
into the middle of the fight for the
country's presidency and her rising
power may have prompted the military to
take over the country in recent years 93
year-old President Robert Mugabe has
quickly elevated his wife up the rungs
of power in 2014 MS mcgaubey was
appointed the head of the ruling party's
women's league which gave her a seat on
a powerful decision-making body but
she's deeply unpopular with the
president's party and her opulence has
caused controversy in poverty-stricken
Zimbabwe Grace Mugabe is 41 years
younger than her husband and was a
teenager when he came to power they met
in the 1990s when she was the
president's secretary and married in
1996 together they have three children
Ms Mugabe has been one of her husband's
biggest supporters even suggesting he
could rule the country as a corpse but
grace miyabi's rise appears to have come
to an end after the military took her
husband into custody
[Music]
